content:
Mapping (I)

  • Allows clients to create a hierarchical collection of referential resources to a specific configuration

    • doesn’t require the Configuration-Id header

  • Allows clients to create a hierarchical collection of referential resources to a resource’s version history

    • doesn’t require the Configuration-Id or Version-Id header
    • clients can navigate the version graph using PROPFIND on the mapped collection
